com.philips.lighting.model

Interface PHBridge


  • public interface PHBridge
    Abstracts bridge object and enables accessing bridge properties like configurations, cache data. Also, this class contain a set of API calls that operate asynchronously to read, write bridge properties inside the bridge. The calls are made to the bridge to access bridge properties in a separate thread.

    • Method Detail

      • getResourceCache

        PHBridgeResourcesCache getResourceCache()
        Enables reading bridge data from runtime cached storage. This is used to obtain the PHBridgeResourcesCache object that contains the last read state of the bridge.
        Returns:
        the PHBridgeResourcesCache object that contains that last fetched object .

      • findNewLights

        void findNewLights(PHLightListener listener)
                   throws PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Returns newly found lights around the bridge. The API call will search for 60 second or completion of the search process in bridge. Application can cancel the process by using cancelSearchNotification() defined in PHNotificationManager class.
        Parameters:
        listener - the PHLightListener anonymous interface to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.

      • updateLight

        void updateLight(PHLight light,
               PHLightListener listener)
                 throws PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Updates the light corresponding to identifier using the information in the new PHLight object. Current version of Hue SDK supports updating name of Light.
        Parameters:
        light - the PHLight object which gives new properties for light with light identifier.
        listener - the PHLightListener to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if light is null.

      • updateLightState

        void updateLightState(java.lang.String lightIdentifier,
                    PHLightState lightState,
                    PHLightListener listener)
        Sets the state of the light with the given identifier using the new light state.
        Parameters:
        lightIdentifier - the light identifier of the lamp.
        lightState - the new state of light with PHLightState object.
        listener - the PHLightListener to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if lightIdentifier,lightState are null.

      • updateLightState

        void updateLightState(PHLight light,
                    PHLightState lightState,
                    PHLightListener listener)
        Updates the LightState of the given light, and awaits a response from the bridge via the listener.
        Parameters:
        light - The PHLight object to be changed.
        lightState - The new PHLightState of the PHLight
        listener - THe listener to be called after completion

      • updateLightState

        void updateLightState(PHLight light,
                    PHLightState lightState)
        Updates the LightState of the given light with no interest in the bridge response (no PHLightListener)
        Parameters:
        light - The PHLight object to be changed.
        lightState - The new PHLightState of the PHLight

      • createGroup

        void createGroup(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String[] lightIdentifiers,
               PHGroupListener listener)
                 throws PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Creates new group using given name and the associated lights.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of group.
        lightIdentifiers - the light identifiers belongs to the this group.
        listener - the PHGroupListener to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if name, lightIdentifiers are null.

      • updateSoftware

        void updateSoftware(PHBridgeConfigurationListener listener)
                    throws PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Enables update Software process. Software update can only happen if user is connected to bridge locally through wifi router at home. portalService needs to be enabled in bridge configuration for software update to happen.
        Parameters:
        listener - the PHBridgeAPIListener to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.

        Throws:

        Throws:
        PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if sceneIdentifier, groupIdentifier are null.

                            PHLightListener listener)
                              throws PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Searches lights attached to the bridge with given serial numbers
        Parameters:
        serials - the array list of serial numbers of lamps
        listener - the PHLightListener to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.

      • saveLightState

        void saveLightState(PHLightState lightState,
                  java.lang.String lightIdentifier,
                  java.lang.String sceneIdentifier,
                  PHSceneListener listener)
                    throws PHHueInvalidAPIException
        Save light state for Scene with given scene identifier
        Parameters:
        lightState - the light state object PHLightState
        lightIdentifier - the identifier of the light
        sceneIdentifier - the identifier of the scene
        listener - the PHSceneListener to be called after completion.
        Throws:
        PHHueInvalidAPIException - if you are not allowed to access the API.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if lightState, lightIdentifier, sceneIdentifier are null.
